sentence: Trump in November backed former Housing and Urban Development official John Gibbs to challenge Meijer.
author: Cristina Marcos
title: The fates of the 10 House Republicans who voted to impeach Trump

sentence: Trump's pick against the personally wealthy Meijer, John Gibbs, was also in bad financial shape.
title: Opinion: Republicans who voted to impeach Trump might be in less peril than people think
